titleStmt.title: A book of cyphers, or, Letters reverst being a work very pleasant & usefull as well for gentlemen as all sorts of artificers engravers painters carvers chacers embroiderers &c. : where you may find a cypher for any name whatsoever curiously compos'd after the newest mode / by Jeremiah Marlow.
titleStmt.author: Marlow, Jeremiah.
Glascock, N.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
